AAL.caption: Timer Finished
AAL.doc: Triggered when the countdown reaches zero.
AAL.name: timer_finished

AAR.caption: Timer Updated
AAR.doc: Triggered each time the timer updates, providing real-time countdown progress.
AAR.name: timer_updated

AAD.caption: Duration
AAD.doc: The total countdown time in seconds.
AAD.name: duration

AAQ.caption: ID
AAQ.doc: A unique identifier for the timer instance, used to manage its state (e.g., naming the cookie).
AAQ.name: id

AAH.caption: Remaining Seconds
AAH.doc: The number of seconds left in the countdown.
AAH.name: seconds_remaining

AAI.caption: Percent Complete
AAI.doc: The percentage of the countdown that has elapsed.
AAI.name: percent_complete
